name: Key to the Dungeon
description:
Key to the dungeon is a casual puzzle game with a simple objective. Collect the keys to open the door to the next floor of the  Dungeon. Beware of enemies and traps the will hinder your progress, and dont waste your energy moving around, you only have so much to spare.

Key to the Dungeon is being developed mainly for mobile but it will have a release on PC. Right now I have a beta version that works only with mouse gestures, but it will have in the future Keyboard and gamepad support and also a widescreen view.
